Class FileManagerModel

java.lang.Object
logicadenegocios.FileManagerModel
public class FileManagerModel extends Object
Class that handles the main logic of the file management application.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Roymar Castillo, Deiner Cespedes, Yader Siezar

    • listDirectory

      public List<File> listDirectory(String path)
      Lists the files in the specified directory, excluding hidden files.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the directory to list.
      Returns:
      a list of files in the directory.

    • searchFiles

      public List<File> searchFiles(List<File> files, String query)
      Searches for files in the provided list that match the query.
      Parameters:
      files - the list of files to search.
      query - the search query.
      Returns:
      a list of files that match the query.

    • sortFiles

      public void sortFiles(List<File> files, String criteria)
      Sorts the provided list of files based on the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      files - the list of files to sort.
      criteria - the criteria to sort by (e.g., "name", "size", "type").

    • createDirectory

      public boolean createDirectory(String path, String name)
      Creates a new directory with the specified name in the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path where the directory will be created.
      name - the name of the new directory.
      Returns:
      true if the directory was created successfully, false otherwise.

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      destination - the destination directory.
      Returns:
      true if the directory was copied successfully, false otherwise.
